About us

WEDOCO is a tech company founded in 2024.

Our mission is to boost efficiency in energy systems.

For that we use modeling, optimization and predictive control.

Our vision is a sustainable energy society.

Services

Building and district thermal energy simulations and design

Mathematical modeling of physical systems

Model Predictive Control

Artifical intelligente and deep learning

Optimization

Data science, handling and processing

Software development

Education, research and open-source

Consulting and advice

Projects

  • All
  • Open Source
  • Research
  • Buildings
  • Ongoing
  • Finished

IBPSA Project 1

BIM/GIS and Modelica Framework for building and community energy system design and operation

The Building Optimization Testing Framework (BOPTEST)

A framework for building control performance benchmarking

Open-Source

These are repositories where we contributed to the open-source development

IBPSA Modelica Library

A Modelica open-source library with basic models that codify best practices for the implementation of models for building and community energy and control systems developed within IBPSA Project 1.

IDEAS Modelica Library

A Modelica open-source library for integrated building and district energy simulations developed at KU Leuven

Buildings Modelica Library

A Modelica open-source library with dynamic simulation models for building and district energy and control systems developed by Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory.

BOPTEST

A framework for building control performance benchmarking developed within IBPSA Project 1.
